DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate a new AF Substrate mapping method based on automatic high density CFAE detection with a multipolar catheter (Pentaray) and the " SCI 30-40 " setting of CARTO CFAE algorithm.
DOC.brief_title: Substrate Ablation Guided by High Density Mapping in Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Patient from 18 Ã 85, with AF* (paroxysmal, and persistent AF) and indication of AF ablation (including redos)* *In accordance with the recommendation of European Society of Cardiology (2010). organized atrial activity (Atrial tachycardia or Flutter)
